faq.title: Everything you need to know about Dinver

items.question: What is Dinver?
items.answer: Dinver is an app that combines a social network with a restaurant guide. It enables guests to discover new restaurants through authentic experiences from other users and earn rewards, while allowing restaurants to showcase everything they offer in one place in an engaging way.

items.question: Is Dinver free?
items.answer: Yes! Dinver is completely free for users. Download the app, create a profile, and start exploring restaurants in your desired city.

items.question: How do I earn points and rewards?
items.answer: You earn points in several ways: by scanning receipts after restaurant visits, posting experiences with photos, and inviting friends. Every two weeks, the Top 1 user and one randomly selected user on the leaderboard win a Dinver Mystery Box with prizes!

items.question: How can I become a partner restaurant?
items.answer: Simple! Contact us through the form on our website or directly via info@dinver.eu. Our team will help you set up your profile, shoot a virtual tour, and explain all the tools we offer.

items.question: What do partner restaurants get?
items.answer: Partner restaurants get featured placement, a 360° virtual tour, an interactive menu, the ability to post "What's New?" announcements about their restaurant, and detailed analytics about visits and guests.

items.question: Is Dinver available in my city?
items.answer: We're currently focused on Croatia, with an emphasis on larger cities. If there are no available restaurants in your city, you can help us - write an experience for one of your favorite restaurants, and we'll turn it into our partner!

hero.title: About us
hero.subtitle: Dinver is a platform that connects food lovers with the best gastronomic experiences in Croatia.

story.title: Our story
paragraphs: Dinver was born from a simple idea: to make it easier for people to find their next favorite restaurant. In a world full of generic reviews and paid recommendations, we wanted to create a place where real experiences come from real people.
Our platform combines a social network with a restaurant guide, allowing users to follow friends, share their culinary moments, and discover hidden gems they wouldn't find elsewhere.
Today, Dinver brings together a community of passionate food lovers who actively explore, share, and get rewarded for every new gastronomic experience.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.subtitle: To connect every food lover with authentic gastronomic experiences and help restaurants reach the right guests.

authenticity.description: We believe in real experiences from real people. No fake reviews, just honest recommendations.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Dinver ("we", "us" or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal data when you use our application and website.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data we collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of data:

dataSharing.title: 4. Data sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We may share data with:
items: Service providers who help us operate

yourRights.title: 5. Your rights
items: Delete your data ("right to be forgotten")
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at info@dinver.eu.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data security
dataSecurity.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss or destruction. However, no method of data transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve functionality and personalize content. You can manage cookie settings through your browser settings.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.intro: For all privacy questions, contact us at:

minorRestriction.title: 10. Age restriction
minorRestriction.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use Dinver. If you are under 18, you must have permission from your parent or legal guardian to use our services.

internationalTransfers.title: 11. International data transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data is stored on secure servers provided by Hetzner in the European Union and AWS S3 in EU regions. We ensure that all data transfers comply with GDPR requirements and use appropriate safeguards to protect your information.

thirdPartyServices.title: 12. Third-party services
thirdPartyServices.intro: We use the following third-party services to operate our platform:
items: AWS S3 (EU regions) - File storage for photos and media
Expo Push Notifications - Mobile push notification delivery
thirdPartyServices.outro: Each of these services has their own privacy policies and data protection measures. We only share the minimum necessary data to provide our services.

receiptData.title: 13. Receipt scanning and verification
receiptData.content: When you scan a receipt to verify your restaurant visit, we collect the JIR and ZKI numbers, restaurant name, and address from the receipt. This data is used solely for verification purposes and fraud prevention. We retain this data for a reasonable period to prevent duplicate submissions and detect fraudulent activity.

automatedDecisions.title: 14. Automated decision making
automatedDecisions.content: We do not use automated decision-making or profiling that produces legal effects or similarly significantly affects you. Restaurant recommendations and content in your feed are based on simple algorithms using your preferences and activity, but you always have control over what you see and interact with.

responseTime.title: 15. Response to your requests
responseTime.content: We will respond to your data access, correction, or deletion requests within 30 days as required by GDPR. In complex cases, we may extend this period by an additional 60 days and will notify you of any delay.

Restaurant information is provided by the restaurants themselves or by users and may not always be accurate or up-to-date. Always verify important information (allergens, opening hours, prices) directly with the restaurant.

receiptVerification.title: 11. Receipt verification and fraud prevention
receiptVerification.content: By scanning receipts to verify your visits, you confirm that each receipt is authentic, represents an actual purchase you made, and has not been previously submitted. We employ fraud detection measures and reserve the right to reject receipts, remove points, suspend accounts, or take legal action against users who submit fraudulent, duplicate, or manipulated receipts.
